rows.label: tlk70000041_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Man, there's really not much to do
when you're guarding a warehouse on
the edge of the city... Ho hum.

rows.label: tlk70000041_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Huh? You know this warehouse belongs
to the royal palace, right? Don't come
any closer, or I'll...do something!

rows.label: tlk70000041_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Nah, just kidding. *Yawn* You came all
the way out here, and I'm SO bored.
How 'bout a story to pass the time?

rows.label: tlk70000041_01_msg0004
rows.name:
This warehouse is actually
old. Like, waaay old. It's
been around for generations.

rows.label: tlk70000041_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Every once in a while, a rumor goes
around that something is buried
beneath it... Like a treasure maybe!

rows.label: tlk70000041_01_msg0006
rows.name:
You wouldn't guess it's that old though,
wouldja? It's been redone so often, it
looks like all the other boring buildings.
